author: awiner
msg: Check in latest patch from Danny Robinson
- Dialogs will now appear at a fixed size if specified, or will resize to that
of the first dialog page and remain that size for all other pages.
- for popup-based dialogs, do not use a FRAMESET
inside of the IFRAME;  just use the IFRAME
- Added javascript code to only register events when popup shown
- Populate title of the popup based on the title of the dialog's content
- Size the popup based on the content

author: ruchithf
msg: - We cannot have two modules called rampart and rampart-sts. Therefore changing rampart-sts to rampart_sts
- Got the SecConv tests working !!! - All test run successfully now :-)

author: bbuffone
msg: added notice.txt to the top level again.
